mapper.select: select order_number,order_price from t_order where order_id = #{orderId}
select a.created_by,b.customer_name,a.gmt_create,a.commodity_price,a.commodity_num,a.version from t_order_detail a,t_customer b where a.created_by=b.customer_id and a.commodity_id = #{commodityId}

select c.commodity_code,p.picture_address,c.commodity_name,c.commodity_retail_price,c.version from t_commodity c,t_commodity_pic p where c.category_first = #{categoryFirst} and c.commodity_id=p.commodity_id

SELECT commodity_code, t_commodity.commodity_id, picture_address, commodity_name, category_first, category_second, commodity_retail_price, commodity_original_price, commodity_totalCount, commodity_is_sold, commodity_is_lack, commodity_inventory, commodity_unit_id FROM t_commodity JOIN t_commodity_pic on t_commodity.commodity_id = t_commodity_pic.commodity_id WHERE t_commodity.is_deleted = 0
AND category_first = #{categoryFirst}
AND category_second = #{categorySecond}
order by commodity_totalCount asc
,commodity_retail_price asc
,commodity_retail_price desc
order by commodity_totalCount DESC
,commodity_retail_price asc
,commodity_retail_price desc
order by commodity_retail_price asc
order by commodity_retail_price desc
select collect_id,commodity_id,customer_id from t_collect where customer_id=#{customerId} and commodity_id=#{commodityId}
SELECT tcmp.picture_address,picture_is_fist_picture FROM t_commodity_pic tcmp JOIN t_commodity tcy ON tcy.commodity_id = tcmp.commodity_id WHERE tcy.commodity_id = #{commodityId}

SELECT tct.commodity_id, customer_id, picture_address, commodity_name, commodity_retail_price FROM t_collect tct JOIN t_commodity ON tct.commodity_id = t_commodity.commodity_id JOIN t_commodity_pic ON tct.commodity_id = t_commodity_pic.commodity_id WHERE tct.is_deleted = 0 AND customer_id = #{customerId}
AND commodity_name = #{commodityName}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_collect SET is_deleted = 1, gmt_modified = now( ), last_modified_by = #{createdBy}, version = version + 1 WHERE customer_id = #{createdBy} AND commodity_id = #{commodityId}
